Load the image

{% raw %}

imgload[source]

imgload(path:str='data/lenna.png', convert:str=None)

Load the image at given path and convert it to numpy ndarray.

Array tools

{% raw %}

arr2img(arr:array)

Convert the PIL.Image to numpy array.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

clipvals[source]

clipvals(arr:array)

Clip the values to ve within the range of 1 byte.
